OfficeId.description: Gets or sets the office identifier.

BookingId.description: Gets or sets the booking identifier.

GdsSource.description: Gets or sets the GDS source.

HasTst.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance has TST items - only used by Amadeus.

AirInformation.description: Gets or sets the air information.

CarSegments.description: Gets or sets the car segments.

EMDs.description: Gets or sets the em ds.

FormOfPayments.description: Gets or sets the form of payments.

HotelSegments.description: Gets or sets the hotel segments.

OtherRemarks.description: Gets or sets the other remarks.

PassiveHotelSegments.description: Gets or sets the passive hotel segments.

TicketingModifiers.description:
Gets or sets the ticketing modifiers - only used by Travelport.
Holds many items but only interested in the 'Key' -> PNRReference
Commissions is part of ticketing modifiers but held in own class

QueueMode.description: Gets or sets the queue mode.

RecordLocator.description: Gets or sets the record locator.

ServiceRequests.description: Gets or sets the service requests.

TicketElements.description: Gets or sets the ticket elements.

BookingDateTime.description: Gets or sets the booking date time.

AgentId.description: Gets or sets the agent identifier.

ClientId.description: Gets or sets the client identifier.

IsModified.description: True if this PNR is a modified version of a previous PNR.

IsCancelled.description: True if this PNR is cancelled.

Version.description: Gets or sets the version - only used by Travelport.

LocatorCode.description: Gets or sets the locator code - only used by Travelport.

OwningPCC.description: Gets or sets the owning pcc - only used by Travelport.

ActionStatuses.description: Gets or sets the action statuses - only used by Travelport.

OtherServiceInformations.description: Gets or sets the other service informations - only used by Travelport.

PNRFreeTextElement.description: Free text element from a PNR

TypeInGds.description: Gets or sets the type in GDS.

PNROtherSegment.description: An unidentified segment from a PNR

PNROtherServiceInformation.description: Other service information element from a PNR

PNRRelatedFlightInfo.description: Flight information related to a PNR element

PNRTravellerPhone.description: Phone information of a traveller in a PNR

PNRRatePeriodInfo.description: Rate period information from a PNR

PublisherEnabled.description: Is the publisher enabled for this booking?

EngineEnabled.description: Is the engine enabled for this booking?
